concept.title: Link Tracking Variables in doPlugins
concept.shortdesc: To help manage link tracking, these following variables are populated before the doPlugins function runs.

conbody.p: Inside of doPlugins, you can use the following values to modify link tracking behavior. For example, you can abort tracking, or add additional variables to tracking requests.

entry.p: Contains the automatically determined link type, if any. Can be set to one of the following:
This is the pe parameter in the image request.
If set with linkURL or linkName, a server call is sent as a download, custom, or exit link.
The name that will appear in the custom, download or exit link report. Truncated at 100 characters. Can be set to any string.
This is the pev2 parameter in the image request.
If set with linkType , an image request will be sent as a download, custom or exit link
The URL of the link, which acts as the name if a linkName does not exist. Can be set to any URL string.
This is the pev1 parameter in the image request.
If set with linkType, an image request will be sent as a download, custom or exit link
The clicked object for reference. This is read-only.
